        Mudiame University is a privately-owned University in Irrua, Edo State, Nigeria. The institution has been officially accredited and/or recognized by the National Universities Commission (NUC), Nigeria, and is on a mission to contribute to the sustainable welfare of society with expertise in science, technology and business, and through teaching, research and community service.

Mudiame University has the vision to be a world-leading institution for technological innovation that addresses the challenges of agriculture and food safety, energy, health, manufacturing, oil and gas, security and transportation on a regional and global scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Irrua, Edo

Requirements


	Applicants must possess a good University Honors Degree not below Second Class Lower Division in related disciplines from a reputable university.
	Applicant must be computer-literate and membership of professional bodies will be an added advantage.


What's Great in The Job?


	Globally Competitive remuneration package designed to attract top talents committed to achieving its vision. 
	Support for continuous academic and career development.
	Decent and secured Accommodation arrangement for its employees.
	State of Art Facilities and teaching Aids.
	Technology-driven environment.
	Collaborations with foreign and local institutions.
	Research and Development Grants.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Facility Maintenance Manager",
  "description": "Abodes Lagos is a top-tier real estate company platform specializing in luxury property rentals, sales, and shortlet management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Maintenance Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Facility Maintenance Manager is responsible for ensuring the quick and timely resolution of all facility maintenance issues across Abodes Lagos&rsquo; managed properties.
	This includes, but is not limited to, handling all maintenance issues such as plumbing, carpentry, electrical, TV and Internet Subscription issues, etc.
	The ideal candidate must demonstrate proactiveness, sensitivity to time-bound tasks, and excellent vendor management skills.


Key Responsibilities
Facility Maintenance:


	Spearhead the resolution of maintenance issues within set timelines.
	Respond appropriately to facility malfunctions and emergencies
	Coordinate routine and ad-hoc maintenance tasks &amp; inspections to ensure all apartments meet operational standards.
	Liaise with team members and make sure all repairs are attended to promptly.
	Liaise with the Housekeepers to make sure all apartments are cleaned between check-outs and check-ins.
	Reviewing utility consumption and striving to minimise costs


Emergency Response:


	Act as the first point of contact for all emergency maintenance needs.
	Develop and implement quick-response protocols for urgent issues.


Vendor and Artisan Management:


	Outsourcing artisans to deal with Maintenance issues that cannot be completed in-house
	Source, vet, and onboard reliable vendors and artisans for all types of maintenance issues (e.g., electricians, plumbers, cleaners, etc.).
	Manage relationships with vendors to ensure quality service delivery.
